website_summaries.verdict: There's plenty to like about Sennheiser's Momentum 3 Wireless headphones, but they join a field crowded with good noise-cancelling options.
pros: Powerful bass depth and crisp, detailed hghs
Strong ANC with transparent listening mode
cons: Sound signature not for those seeking accuracy
App and Alexa integration can be a little buggy

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough...
customer_reviews.text: PROs: Very good sound quality The theory behind smart play/pause function (see CONs) Comfortable Physical buttons (I prefer) CONs: Battery life - very poor Phone app - very poor, constantly disconnects and takes ages to get connected Smart play/pause - if you turn your head to the side it will pause for no reason at all (eg when crossing a street, if you look left/right, music will pause), sometimes gets very confused and just starts randomly pausing music. Soft case
customer_reviews.author: imagine

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound great, noise cancelling is good, battery life not bad. The only thing I found that I could not get on with was when you fold or unfold the headphones to either put them on or take them off the hinges on three occasions caught my fingers , at first i thought was that me imagining that, but after the third time I knew something was wrong with the hinges , returned to amazon for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Sound Quality & The Most Comfortable Headphones I Have Ever Worn
customer_reviews.text: Having read the reviews of the other top brands in the same price range I opted for the Momentum 3's as my main priorities were sound quality and comfort (as I wear specs) over noise cancelling. I must admit they haven't disappointed as the soundstage is stunning and they are by far the most comfortable headphones I have ever worn. Battery life is better than advertised and the noise cancellation is absolutely fine for my needs. Build quality is also head and shoulders better than the others I tried on before buying these bad boys.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Issues with ear cups
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones. They have great range and deep bass. My problem is that from day one the left hand ear cup was sliding down the rail at the slightest movement meaning the headphones continually slide on my head with no security. The right side is fine and secure but the left side makes wearing these phones a bit annoying. Great sound - more to be done with the fit. A real shame for some fantastic sounding headphones. Noise cancellation is adequate and battery life is pretty low but not problematic
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sounding headphones.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are by far the best sounding out of any consumer grade audio equipment I've ever had. All of the features that come with the headphone to me are surplus to requirement. It's exactly what I've been looking for in a headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound with a warm punchy bass that doesn’t overwhelm or sound muffled. Noise cancelling is very effective, not as good as the top tiers of Sony and Bose, but enough to have a peaceful train/plane journey. Battery life is a slight disappointment, however, it’s worth the sacrifice considering how well these sound!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Case
customer_reviews.text: They look fantastic and even better because they are not Bose like everyone else has. Very easy to use the sound quality is brilliant and the noise cancelling works really well, can’t rate the headphones enough. It’s just a shame they don’t come with a ‘hard’ storage case as I don’t want to damage them. Hopefully a hard case will be produced?
customer_reviews.author: Graeme Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Ace product, sound and comfort awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, really comfortable and sound ace. Not interested in noise cancellation so can’t comment. Arrived quick, well packaged and easy to set up. I thought my old Sennheiser’s were still good, until I started using these. Not even ‘run-in’ and the sound had so much depth. Bluetooth words a treat round the house. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: dean

customer_reviews.title: Battery life could've been better but isn't the worst
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancelling was good. It didn't make everything go completely dead silent but didn't give me that pressure feeling and that's something I prefer to not have. I tried the Bose 700s before and these blow them out of the water when it comes to everything about sound quality. The sound is really energetic with a punchy bass response, warm and mellow mids and highs that are clear without being too bright or sibilant. Battery life could've been better but that's probs the only thing that you can say is below average. The sound more than makes up for it though imo
customer_reviews.author: Anas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound
customer_reviews.text: Best sound in its class. They look great and the build quality is excellent. The noise cancelling works well but the Bose 700’s are better. The battery life is ok but they are behind the competition. Overall, if you’re after sound quality in a portable headphone. Buy these!
customer_reviews.author: SJGF

customer_reviews.title: Pairing a total hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: Right now the sound from these headphones is worth the hassle. The but and it is a big but it has taken 2 days to get any sound out of them. Tried with a Yamaha RN602 amp, Bluesound Node 2i sreamer and an iphone 11. It suddenly decided to play ball and work. Now idea how and if it will do so tomorrow. Highly unlikely I will be a sennheiser customer again.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, but the automatic functions are not great
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with these headphones but cannot use the auto cut out function as they simply turn off every time I move my head. This was a function I wanted but actually now am used to using them without it
customer_reviews.author: Aidan Mcleod

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of headphones with excellent fit and adjustment. Various levels of noise cancelling is a plus. Sound is pretty descent and adjustments can be made in the app. The app is fairly simple but is useful.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Superb true sound, controls were disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The controls are not intuitive but the sound is phenomenal. I just wish the fit my head properly. A great pair of headphones
customer_reviews.author: Mr

customer_reviews.title: Superb sound quality and ANC but not that comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: I very much liked the sound quality and the ANC like others have mentioned but I found them a bit uncomfortable to wear. I have a shaved head and it was leaving dents on my scalp because they are heavy and the headband is not very soft.
customer_reviews.author: George M

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I've just been listening to Sonic Imperfections on Resonance fm and these headphones are handling the eclectic mix of music with ease. Very comfy and a good battery life. Great product Sennheiser 👍👌
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Poor noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable, noise cancelling is very poor, sound stage is good but sound is also too bright which is very noticeable with vocals.
customer_reviews.author: Jackflyer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product recommend to anybody looking at this product
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this product apart from they are amazing, the noise cancelling it brill, the sound quality is superb and considering these are my first wireless headphones the battery life is around 18 to 20 hours so hats off to sennheiser.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: No doubt a brilliant pair of headphones! Fantastic music quality and can’t fault them from anything except battery life which isn’t very good. The sound quality and bass definitely outweighs the 1 negative. Features are very cool too!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Check compatability with your make of TV.
customer_reviews.text: I looked on line for wireless headphones suitable for TV viewing. I picked MOMENTUM 3 had a great write up so bought them. Today tried to pair with Sony KD -55A1 TV no luck. Contacted Sennheiser tech team said I would need BT-T 100 cost £70 to make it work. Product to be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Roy F

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, replaced my wired Momentum 2.0 pair. Noise cancellation is excellent, and the sound is just as good as my old pair. I listen to music a lot, metal and extreme metal mainly and it is excellent for picking out individual instruments. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Niall

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but equaliser is basic
customer_reviews.text: Great sound although the app equaliser is very basic. Very comfortable to wear too. Bluetooth range is rather poor. Noise cancellation is ok but I dont really use it that often and battery life isn't an issue for me either. Overall pleased with my purchase except for the equaliser to tailor the sound to my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Robert h.

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: The look and it does what it says it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Great sound you can adjust with app!
customer_reviews.text: Great and very confortable with great sound for my daily walks
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: 100% as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these headphones. Very easy to use and the sound is great!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Takes my music to a different level
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound that can’t be faulted, clear, bold and deep.
customer_reviews.author: P. INSKIP

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: These sound absolutely fantastic. If you are toying between these and the sony wh-1000xm3 and quality of sound is your number 1 priority the momentum's knock spots off the sony's.
customer_reviews.author: stephen cracknell

customer_reviews.title: Glitchy and unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Random disconnects, random video pauses and left cup failed after 3 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Damir elsik

customer_reviews.title: Buy these
customer_reviews.text: The sound is tremendous. They literally shake your head from the lows. Top headphones
customer_reviews.author: Razvan S.

product_meta.title: Sennheiser MOMENTUM 3 Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones with Alexa built-in, Auto On/Off, Smart Pause Functionality and Smart Control App
product_meta.description: Colour Name:BlackSennheiser M3AEBTXL Momentum Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones With Auto On/Off, Smart Pause Functionality And Smart Control App - Black
feature_bullets: Get the music playing faster with the auto on/off fold and smart pause feature which detects when the headphones are stored or not in use

Choose your sound based on your surroundings: advanced active noise cancellation offers three modes that are tailored to different environments and the transparent hearing feature lets you have conversations without removing headphones
Experience superior comfort and design with genuine leather head strap and ear pads, sturdy matte steel arms
Effortless interaction: intuitive controls for music and fast access to voice assistants on smart Devices such as Alexa, Apple, Siri and Google
Stay smart and connected with the Sennheiser SMART Control app for customization and the tile app to help locate misplaced headphones
Alexa integration is available from 1st October by firmware update via Sennheiser Smart Control App
Alexa built-in devices let you instantly connect to Alexa to play music, control your smart home, get information, news, weather, and more using just your voice.

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
